mapper.select: SELECT po.purc_order_code , sup.sup_name , po.purc_order_reg_date , LEAST(DATE_ADD(progress_monitoring_date, INTERVAL 7 DAY), mrp_due_date) AS next_progress_date , mrp.mrp_due_date , emp.emp_name , ROUND((IFNULL(pm.material_cnt,0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) AS total_progress_rate FROM progress_monitoring pm JOIN purchase_order po ON pm.purchase_order_purc_order_no = po.purc_order_no JOIN material ma ON pm.material_material_no = ma.material_no JOIN employee emp ON pm.employee_emp_no = emp.emp_no JOIN contract ct ON po.contract_cont_no = ct.cont_no JOIN supplier sup ON ct.supplier_sup_no = sup.sup_no JOIN material_resource_plan mrp ON po.material_resource_plan_mrp_no = mrp.mrp_no

SELECT po.purc_order_code , sup.sup_name , po.purc_order_reg_date , LEAST(DATE_ADD(progress_monitoring_date, INTERVAL 7 DAY), mrp_due_date) AS next_progress_date , mrp.mrp_due_date , emp.emp_name , ROUND((IFNULL(pm.material_cnt,0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) AS total_progress_rate FROM progress_monitoring pm JOIN purchase_order po ON pm.purchase_order_purc_order_no = po.purc_order_no JOIN material ma ON pm.material_material_no = ma.material_no JOIN employee emp ON pm.employee_emp_no = emp.emp_no JOIN contract ct ON po.contract_cont_no = ct.cont_no JOIN supplier sup ON ct.supplier_sup_no = sup.sup_no JOIN material_resource_plan mrp ON po.material_resource_plan_mrp_no = mrp.mrp_no LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT ma.material_no , ma.material_name , ma.material_code , ct.cont_material_cnt , mrp.mrp_due_date , SUM(pm.material_cnt) AS total_material_cnt , ROUND((IFNULL(SUM(pm.material_cnt),0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) AS total_progress_rate
FROM progress_monitoring pm JOIN purchase_order po ON pm.purchase_order_purc_order_no = po.purc_order_no JOIN material ma ON pm.material_material_no = ma.material_no JOIN contract ct ON po.contract_cont_no = ct.cont_no JOIN material_resource_plan mrp ON po.material_resource_plan_mrp_no = mrp.mrp_no
WHERE po.purc_order_code = #{purc_order_code} GROUP BY ma.material_no, ma.material_code, ma.material_name, ct.cont_material_cnt, mrp.mrp_due_date ORDER BY ma.material_code

SELECT pm.progress_monitoring_ver , ma.material_name , ma.material_code , ct.cont_material_cnt , mrp.mrp_due_date , pm.progress_monitoring_date , pm.material_cnt , ROUND((IFNULL(pm.material_cnt,0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) AS progress_rate , ROUND((IFNULL(total_pm.total_material_cnt,0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) AS total_progress_rate , ct.cont_material_cnt - IFNULL(total_pm.total_material_cnt, 0) AS rest_progress_cnt
FROM progress_monitoring pm JOIN purchase_order po ON pm.purchase_order_purc_order_no = po.purc_order_no JOIN material ma ON pm.material_material_no = ma.material_no JOIN contract ct ON po.contract_cont_no = ct.cont_no JOIN material_resource_plan mrp ON po.material_resource_plan_mrp_no = mrp.mrp_no
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT purchase_order_purc_order_no , material_material_no , SUM(material_cnt) AS total_material_cnt FROM progress_monitoring GROUP BY purchase_order_purc_order_no, material_material_no ) AS total_pm ON pm.purchase_order_purc_order_no = total_pm.purchase_order_purc_order_no AND pm.material_material_no = total_pm.material_material_no
WHERE po.purc_order_code = #{purc_order_code} ORDER BY pm.progress_monitoring_ver ASC, ma.material_code ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM progress_monitoring WHERE DATE(progress_monitoring_date) = STR_TO_DATE(#{progress_monitoring_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
